mapper.select: select TAXI_SHARE_ID as "taxiShareId", MEMBER_ID as "memberId", PASSENGERS_NUM as "passengersNum", PICKUP_LOCATION as "pickupLocation", LATITUDE_PL as "latitudePL", LONGITUDE_PL as "longitudePL", PICKUP_TIME as "pickupTime", STATUS as "status", CREATED_DATE as "createdDate", DESTINATION as "destination", LATITUDE_DS as "latitudeDS", LONGITUDE_DS as "longitudeDS", OPENCHAT_LINK as "openchatLink", OPENCHAT_CODE as "openchatCode", ESTIMATED_AMOUNT as "estimatedAmount", time_nego as "timeNego", from TAXI_SHARE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TAXI_SHARE ( MEMBER_ID, PASSENGERS_NUM, PICKUP_LOCATION, LATITUDE_PL, LONGITUDE_PL, PICKUP_TIME, DESTINATION, LATITUDE_DS, LONGITUDE_DS, OPENCHAT_LINK, OPENCHAT_CODE, ESTIMATED_AMOUNT, TIME_NEGO ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{passengersNum}, #{pickupLocation}, #{latitudePL}, #{longitudePL}, #{pickupTime}, #{destination}, #{latitudeDS}, #{longitudeDS}, #{openchatLink}, #{openchatCode}, #{estimatedAmount}, #{timeNego} )
mapper.select: select TAXI_SHARE_ID as "taxiShareId", MEMBER_ID as "memberId", PASSENGERS_NUM as "passengersNum", PICKUP_LOCATION as "pickupLocation", LATITUDE_PL as "latitudePL", LONGITUDE_PL as "longitudePL", PICKUP_TIME as "pickupTime", STATUS as "status", CREATED_DATE as "createdDate", DESTINATION as "destination", LATITUDE_DS as "latitudeDS", LONGITUDE_DS as "longitudeDS", OPENCHAT_LINK as "openchatLink", OPENCHAT_CODE as "openchatCode", ESTIMATED_AMOUNT as "estimatedAmount", time_nego as "timeNego", TO_CHAR(PICKUP_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS "pickupTimeOnly", nvl((select count(member_id) from taxi_share_join tsj where ts.taxi_share_id = tsj.taxi_share_id group by taxi_share_id ),0) as "currentPassengerNum", (select nickname from member m where ts.member_id = m.member_id) as "memberNickname", (select image_url from member m where ts.member_id = m.member_id) as "memberImageUrl" from TAXI_SHARE ts where trunc(PICKUP_TIME) = #{param1} order by status desc
